body:
**Is this a bug report or feature request?**
* Bug Report - example yamls

**Deviation from expected behavior:**

Inconsistent yaml for compression_mode. Some use 
```
compressionMode: none
```
https://github.com/rook/rook/blob/deb2ab0da6a00a53e0296572b471b47d0211c0c0/cluster/examples/kubernetes/ceph/filesystem-ec.yaml#L25
https://github.com/rook/rook/blob/deb2ab0da6a00a53e0296572b471b47d0211c0c0/cluster/examples/kubernetes/ceph/filesystem-test.yaml#L21
https://github.com/rook/rook/blob/deb2ab0da6a00a53e0296572b471b47d0211c0c0/cluster/examples/kubernetes/ceph/object-test.yaml#L18


and others use 
```
    parameters:
      compression_mode: none
```
https://github.com/rook/rook/blob/deb2ab0da6a00a53e0296572b471b47d0211c0c0/cluster/examples/kubernetes/ceph/filesystem.yaml#L36
https://github.com/rook/rook/blob/deb2ab0da6a00a53e0296572b471b47d0211c0c0/cluster/examples/kubernetes/ceph/object-ec.yaml#L37
https://github.com/rook/rook/blob/deb2ab0da6a00a53e0296572b471b47d0211c0c0/cluster/examples/kubernetes/ceph/object.yaml#L39


**Expected behavior:**
I checked with @travisn  
```
@Tim Hughes They are both officially supported, but we should 
update the examples for consistency. The preference is really to 
use the parameters, but support is still there for the compressionMode 
for backward compatibility. I expect we’ll keep both methods indefinitely
```
title: Inconsistent yaml for compression_mode
